# Cursor & VS Code Plugin
## Deploy Straight from Your IDE. Get a Live URL in 1 Click.

Get the VS Code Plugin

Get the Cursor Plugin

## From Code to Live URL in Seconds
**The YouWare IDE Extension integrates directly into your development environment. It handles the build, hosting, and deployment of your project with a single command, giving you a public URL to share anyone can view.**

Title: YouWare for Developers | Prototype with AI APIs & Deploy from Your ...
URL: https://i.youware.com/solutions/developer
Text: YouWare for Developers | Prototype with AI APIs & Deploy from Your IDE
# Code Less. Build More.
## Your Weekend Project, Solved.
[
Reclaim Your Development Velocity.
](https://www.youware.com/?utm_source=webflow-ctabutton)
[![Embedded YouTube video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/b0-Yv7UfLEw/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0-Yv7UfLEw)
## Built to Break Down Development Friction.
Stop wrestling with API configs and DevOps hurdles. YouWare gives you instant, zero-config access to the world's best AI models and lets you deploy your code—from any IDE—with a single click.
‍Stop building the same scaffolding over and over. Start building the fun stuff.
[
Your Next Side Project is Waiting.
](https://www.youware.com/create?utm_source=webflow-ctabutton)
## The Ultimate Developer Toolkit for the AI Era.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/687479139e559930c95a2d08/68b9a63f16c0807b8d810479_close-line.svg)
***Old Way***
**API Fatigue:**Spending more time on auth, config, and billing than on building features.
**DevOps Drag:**Wasting a day to deploy a simple side project for a friend to see.

Title: Yourware MCP: Streamline Project Uploads to Yourware
Author: 
Published Date: 2025-01-01T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://mcpmarket.com/server/yourware
Text: AboutREADMEFAQ

## About

Yourware MCP provides a server for seamlessly uploading projects to Yourware, supporting both single files and entire directories. It integrates with development tools like Cursor and Claude Code through MCP server configurations, streamlining the process of deploying and showcasing your work on the Yourware platform. By setting the YOURWARE\_API\_KEY environment variable, users can authenticate and manage their projects efficiently.

## Key Features

- Configurable for various development environments
- Utilizes YOURWARE\_API\_KEY for authentication
- Supports uploading single files or entire directories
- 1 GitHub stars
- Integrates with Cursor and Claude Code
- Streamlines project deployment to Yourware

## Use Cases

- Quickly sharing project showcases on Yourware
- Automating project uploads using Claude Code
- Deploying code projects to Yourware from Cursor IDE

Advertisement

Title: Develop with local VS Code or Cursor on an Anyscale workspace

URL: https://docs.anyscale.com/platform/workspaces/vscode
Text: Develop with local VS Code or Cursor on an Anyscale workspace | Anyscale Docs
[Skip to main content](#__docusaurus_skipToContent_fallback)
On this page
# Develop with local VS Code or Cursor on an Anyscale workspace
[View Markdown](https://docs.anyscale.com/platform/workspaces/vscode.md)
# Develop with local VS Code or Cursor on an Anyscale workspace
This page describes using your local installation of VS Code or Cursor for interactive development on an Anyscale workspace.
When you use a local IDE connected to an Anyscale workspace, you're developing inside of the containerized environment deployed to your workspace Ray cluster. See[Launch jobs and services from an Anyscale workspace](https://docs.anyscale.com/development/workspace-defaults)and[Container-driven development on Anyscale](https://docs.anyscale.com/development/containers).
## Launch a local IDE from the Anyscale console[​](#launch-a-local-ide-from-the-anyscale-console)
You use the Anyscale console to automatically configure a connection between your preferred IDE and an Anyscale workspace.

Title: The VS Code/Cursor Setup to INCREASE Productivity (2025)
Author: Cole Caccamise
Published Date: 2025-02-23T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fG6HV3pxtOI
Text: This is my setup for Cursor/VSCode that boosts my productivity as a developer. In this video, I’ll show you the best VSCode extensions, settings, themes and Cursor AI tips that I’ve found helpful. I hope this is valuable.\n\nMy wallpapers (new 'Kiwi' pack just dropped!) - https://creator.kiwi/HYYASrI\n\nSubscribe to my newsletter (where I document what I’m building) - https://caccamise.link/letters \n\nThemes:\nVesper - https://vscodethemes.com/e/raunofreib...\nMinimal - https://vscodethemes.com/e/nichabosh....\nPoimandres - https://vscodethemes.com/e/pmndrs.pmn...\nSymbols (Icons) - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\n\nExtensions:\nProject Manager - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nBookmarks - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nBetter Comments - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nCode Spell Checker - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nPrettier - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nPaste JSON as Code - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nMintlify - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/...\nError Lens
